body_html: I have found the solution. It's because I have been trying to build tensorflow in /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-distributions, and that conflicts with the installation path of tensorflow, which I have left it default. I solved that by placing the source of tensorflow in /usr/local.
body_text: I have found the solution. It's because I have been trying to build tensorflow in /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-distributions, and that conflicts with the installation path of tensorflow, which I have left it default. I solved that by placing the source of tensorflow in /usr/local.
body: I have found the solution. It's because I have been trying to build tensorflow in `/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-distributions`, and that conflicts with the installation path of tensorflow, which I have left it default. I solved that by placing the source of tensorflow in `/usr/local`.
